TopicTitle: Okay, what monster ate the forum?

Articles.Content:
We've seen the kraken and the cthulhu ingame. I suppose we could blame the forum crash on either one of those... But really, this is a whole new level of KSP catastrophe, so I think it needs to be the work of a previously unknown monster.

Dragon?

Giant?

Hydra?

Personally, I like the Charybdis, but that may be too obscure.
Serverus? ... or should that be ... sir-virus?
The Discord, I guess:)
kraken strikes again
The monster of excessive idle sessions and database corruption, it seems.

The thing is:

Since they don't know what caused it: It can happen again.

Since it can happen again: It will happen again. I hope there is an update soon where they detail the steps they will take to make sure that won't happen.
Well, they said they're going to implement a more robust backup system. That's kinda why we're back to October, the backup is incomplete.
The Cookie Monster?
Krakendiscordiancookieservermonster.
I'd call it the Jormungandr, seeing as it consumed a huge chunk of the KSP community. (Or Midgardsormr if you prefer.)
Murphy's law happened.
Im sure the Space Kraken is involved...
The Kraken evolved out of the game and into the computer realm. It took it over and heavily corrupted the forums and Spaceport

Im sure the Space Kraken is involved...

Yes, the forum crash was at the same time I did my first manned landing on Bob and studied the dead kraken.
No monster ate the forum, Squad got too close of the magic boulder
It obviously can't be the Kraken, so it must be the Mun, along with its giant army of fish creatures on its surface, attacking the forums wit big monolith lasers of doom!
I used to be a Sr. Spacecraft Engineer like you but then I took a DDOS attack to the knee
I think it's caused by a strain of space bacteria named Cthulhadiscordius Kraken that was contracted by the developers during a space walk above Jool.
Probably Kraken

I thought that cracken was dead?

One of the kerbal engineers messed up the servers.

I used to be a Sr. Spacecraft Engineer like you but then I took a DDOS attack to the knee

Demoted due to a server outage. Bad Luck Brian/DarthVader

I was already on a distinguished road.

And "it" happened.

I think it was the U.S. government spying on the forums and thinking the things we say are true, dang CISPA

I almost survived it too
Chrysalid...just like one of their victims forum became a zombie

The Kraken has taken her revenge... she seeps back to her home of darkness...

Seriously, this may sound paranoid, but I think it was a hacker. They said the same sort of thing happened to thousands of other websites.
